entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
